text: KidsTv.
Are you ready for the animal dance??
Come on!

The animal dance, the animal dance
Do a little boogie, a little woogie

Watch Mr. Lion clap his hands, 
Doing the animal dance!
Clap clap clap your hands
Clap clap your hands!

Everybody clap along
Doin the animal dance
YEAH !

The animal dance, the animal dance
Do a little jiggle, a little wiggle

Watch Ms. Elephant stomp her feet, 
Doin the animal dance!
Stomp stomp stomp your feet
Stomp stomp your feet

Everybody stomp along
Doin the animal dance

The animal dance, the animal  dance
Do a little shimmy, a little shake

Watch Mr. Zebra shake around, 
Doin the animal dance!
Shake shake shake it off
Shake shake it off

Everybody shake along
Doin the animal dance

The animal dance, the animal dance
Do a little jump, a little jive

Watch Ms. monkey come alive
Doin the animal dance!
Jump jump jump around
Jump jump around

Everybody jump around  
Doin the animal dance

The animal dance, the animal dance
Do a little hip, a little hop,

Watch Mr. Hippo tap his feet
Doin the animal dance
Tap tap tap your feet
Tap tap your feet
Great job!

Everybody tap along
Doin the animal dance

The animal dance, the animal dance
Do a little wiggle, a little jiggle

Watch Ms. Giraffe do the twist
Doin the animal dance
Twist Twist Twist
Yeah!
Twist Twist Twist

Everybody twist along 
Doin the animal dance

Doin the animal dance!
